INSERT INTO amocrm_webhook_events (ts, event_type, entity_type, amocrm_entity_id, event_hash, payload, account_id, processed)
VALUES (NOW(), $1, $2, $3, $4, $5::jsonb, $6, FALSE)
ON CONFLICT (event_hash) DO NOTHING
RETURNING id
UPDATE amocrm_webhook_events SET processed = TRUE WHERE id = $1
